41351.name: School life expectancy, primary, gender parity index (GPI)
41351.description: Ratio of female school life expectancy to the male school life expectancy. It is calculated by dividing the female value for the indicator by the male value for the indicator. A GPI equal to 1 indicates parity between females and males. In general, a value less than 1 indicates disparity in favor of males and a value greater than 1 indicates disparity in favor of females.
41351.s_name: World Bank EdStats: School life expectancy, primary, gender parity index (GPI)

source.name: World Bank EdStats: School life expectancy, primary, gender parity index (GPI)
